CustomField.formula: OR(IF( ISBLANK($User.COMM_EffectiveAccountId__c), $User.COMM_AccountId__c = COMM_Account__r.Id && CONTAINS($User.COMM_ContactAirports__c, TEXT(COMM_AirportValue__c)), CONTAINS($User.COMM_EffectiveAccountId__c, COMM_Account__r.Id) && CONTAINS($User.COMM_ContactAirports__c, TEXT(COMM_AirportValue__c))), OR($UserRole.DeveloperName ='COMM_ANA_Admin',$UserRole.DeveloperName ='COMM_Platform_Administrator',$UserRole.DeveloperName ='COMM_SABA',$UserRole.DeveloperName ='COMM_AirportAdmin_LIS',$UserRole.DeveloperName ='COMM_AirportAdmin_OPO',$UserRole.DeveloperName ='COMM_AirportAdmin_FAO',$UserRole.DeveloperName ='COMM_AirportAdmin_FNC',$UserRole.DeveloperName ='COMM_AirportAdmin_PDL'))
CustomField.label: Check Partner Visibility
